Address.Address2: next to Al Rigga Post Office, Deira

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Avari Dubai Hotel places you in the heart of Dubai, convenient to Hamarain Centre and Deira City Centre. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Reef Mall and Al Ghurair Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 178 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. Guests can get to nearby shops on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafés, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 4 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has facilities measuring 408 square feet (38 square meters), including meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafés, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 4 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hamarain Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Reef Mall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Deira City Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Al Ghurair Centre - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Dubai Creek - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Creek Park - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Dubai Tennis Stadium - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
BurJuman Mall - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Naif Souq - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Bastakiya - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Dubai Museum - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Perfume Souq - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Grand Mosque - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Spice Souk - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi

The preferred airport for Avari Dubai Hotel is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
